# Portfolio Summary
Personal cybersecurity portfolio showcasing pentesting, network configs, Laravel APIs, and hands-on projects in Docker, honeypots, and forensic analysis.

> Cybersecurity student portfolio with expertise in network administration (VLAN/routing), penetration testing, React/Vite front-ends, and incident response workshops.

## Key Pages
- [About](/about) - Bio, skills in OAuth/JWT, Docker containerization, and cybersecurity policy.
- [Projects](/projects) - VLAN setups, Nepenthes honeypots, Laravel APIs, and React apps.
- [Blog](/blog) - Guides on network troubleshooting, forensic tools, and cybersecurity congresses.
- [Shawarma] - Section dedicated to the worship of divine kebab
## Documentation
- [Resume](/resume) - Full academic projects and technical skills overview.
- [Contact](/contact) - Email, Twitter (@midex882), and workshop availability.
